item.title: Venice Critics’ Week Unveils Brit-Packed Lineup, Including Julia Jackman’s ‘100 Nights of Hero’ Starring Emma Corrin, Nicholas Galitzine and Charli xcx
item.description: British films dominate this year’s lineup of the Venice Film Festival’s Critics’ Week, which is dedicated to first and second works. London-born filmmaker Oscar Hudson’s absurdist comedy “Straig
